title: They Helped Women Fight Online Abuse. They Were Barred From the U.S.
summary_full: The founders of HateAid, a German human-rights group that helps victims of online attacks, were accused by the Trump administration of being part of a “global censorship-industrial complex.”
summary_public: The founders of HateAid, a German human-rights group that helps victims of online attacks, were accused by the Trump administration of being part of a “global censorship-industrial complex.”

DE.label: negative
DE.evidence: They Helped Women Fight Online Abuse. They Were Barred From the U.S.
